column5: Anybody wanna guess how deadly this will be? I didnt expect them to shine here in open water because the conditions that exist in the southern US that made them huge dont apply here for the most part but I bet they will be deadly through the ice,just bend the wires out,thoughts people?
not much different then a spreader
Will be killer on perch use 4 with minnows and small spoons on the others
I expect a lot of tangles.
I bet the lakers would come from miles to inspect.
Im thinking it would fish much different than a spreader because of the swivels and longer arms.Im think it might make a great slow jigging setup
